definition: far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: That meant jaunting five or six miles each day to get the same time on my feet that I’d spent running.
sentences.chinese: 那就意味着我可以用原来跑步的时间远足五到六英里。

sentences.english: We went for an outing on a crisp fall day.
sentences.chinese: 我们在一个秋高气爽的日子去远足了。

sentences.english: The bear leader bear-led a group of wealthy young men on a cross-country hike.
sentences.chinese: 家庭教师带领一组富家子弟作越野远足。

sentences.english: B. Sarah likes doing word puzzles.
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢猜字谜和远足吗？

sentences.english: Spring is the best time for excursionists.
sentences.chinese: 春天是远足者们最好的时光。

sentences.english: Nude-hiking advocates say they aren't out to startle people.
sentences.chinese: 裸体远足倡导者称，他们没有惊吓别人的企图。

sentences.english: Today it is an occasion for hiking and chrysanthemum appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 今天人们利用这个机会赏菊和远足。

sentences.english: This is ideal for Day Outings, Fishing and Waterskiing.
sentences.chinese: 实用于白昼外出远足，钓鱼，滑水。

sentences.english: For weekend jaunts, he bought a motorcycle.
sentences.chinese: 为了周末的远足，他买了一辆摩托车。

sentences.english: Thvia's why Bella can'tgo on a hunting trip with him.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么他不能带上贝拉一起去狩猎远足的因由。

sentences.english: Sick of holding your heavy water bottle while you go on hikes in the desert?
sentences.chinese: 你是否已经厌倦了在沙漠远足时带着沉重的水壶？

sentences.english: Good shoes. You don't need hiking boots for many shorter hikes.
sentences.chinese: 大量的短途的徒步旅行都不需要你穿远足靴。

sentences.english: We discovered two great hikes only minutes from the downtown sprawl.
sentences.chinese: 我们发现两大远足行径距市中心仅需几分钟。

sentences.english: We had one last trip to make, a day excursion from Damascus by car - just.
sentences.chinese: 最后的游程是从大马士革乘汽车出发作一天的远足。

sentences.english: I go on hikes with family or friends.
sentences.chinese: 我与家人或朋友一起远足。

definition: to go for an outing/to go on an excursion
outing in the country/to go on a hike/to go courting
lit. tread the green; go for a walk in the spring (when the grass has turned green)/spring hike season around Qingming festival 清明, 4th-6th April
to cook a meal over a campfire (usu. for a group of people on an outing)/cookout
to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
